connection

Class SocketConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • connection.SocketConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection

    public class SocketConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connection
    Connection implementation that uses Sockets.

      • readingTask

        public void readingTask()
        Entry point of the receiving Thread. Constantly reads Messages and puts them in the messagesIn queue.

      • sendingTask

        public void sendingTask()
        Entry point of the sending Thread. Constantly reads Messages from the messagesOut queue and sends them.
